 118:     """Transformer that maps a dataset into integer-valued bins.
 119: 
 120:     The bins are created in a feature-wise fashion, with equally-spaced
 121:     quantiles.
 122: 
 123:     Large datasets are subsampled, but the feature-wise quantiles should
 124:     remain stable.
 125: 
 126:     If the number of unique values for a given feature is less than
 127:     ``max_bins``, then the unique values of this feature are used instead of
 128:     the quantiles.
 129: 
 130:     Parameters
 131:     ----------
 132:     max_bins : int, optional (default=256)
 133:         The maximum number of bins to use. If for a given feature the number of
 134:         unique values is less than ``max_bins``, then those unique values
 135:         will be used to compute the bin thresholds, instead of the quantiles.
 136:     subsample : int or None, optional (default=1e5)
 137:         If ``n_samples > subsample``, then ``sub_samples`` samples will be
 138:         randomly choosen to compute the quantiles. If ``None``, the whole data
 139:         is used.
